title: My First Post
body: Today Im starting to build out a real world application using react and goolge data studio or charts. This application is going to supply graphs and other metrics for schools with publicly available information that is currently supplied to schools and districts in a format that isnt very useful. More to come as I make progress

title: Alberta Assurance
body: I ended up finishing the data visualization platform from my first post. I used React, Syncfusion and Firebase. Firebase is being used for user credentials/data storage and syncfusion for visualizing the data. I made this project not cause I thought anthing would come from it but it was project I made that has an actual use and problem to solve. As of now I have no one using it but as of now it is open and available, if you want to know more check it out @ https://moreinformed-auth-dev.web.app/

title: UE5 Project
body: I've played around with unreal and web dev quite a bit over the last 2 years and I have built out a few complete web projects and want to do the same for game dev. I finally have an idea of something I'd like to create and a good idea of what I need to do to get it done.

title: update/iotops.ca
body: I recently did some data visualization work for East Central Catholic Schools and ended up making a template for school board data and wanted to have a site where people could find it, so I made iotops.ca. It allows me to track and invoice organizations that I do work for instead of just using something like an e-transfer. Now that I have this up and running I am looking for more career work that I could work full-time while maintaining IOTops.ca on the side to see if anything comes of it.
